name: UPaperTileLayer
doc: This class represents a single layer in a tile map.  All layers in the map must have the size dimensions.

CollisionThicknessOverride: The override thickness of the collision for this layer (when bOverrideCollisionThickness is set)
CollisionOffsetOverride:
The override offset of the collision for this layer (when bOverrideCollisionOffset is set)
Note: This is measured in Unreal Units (cm) from the center of the tile map component, not from the previous layer.
LayerColor: The color of this layer (multiplied with the tile map color and passed to the material as a vertex color)
bHiddenInEditor: Is this layer currently hidden in the editor?
bHiddenInGame: Should this layer be hidden in the game?
bLayerCollides:
Should this layer generate collision?
Note: This only has an effect if the owning tile map has collision enabled
bOverrideCollisionThickness: Should this layer use a custom thickness for generated collision instead of the thickness setting in the tile map?
bOverrideCollisionOffset: Should this layer use a custom offset for generated collision instead of the layer drawing offset?
